attributes.description:
A not to be missed bakkie! Excellent mileage and a powerful vehicle. Full-service History and well-maintained. Comes with a Nudge bar, Rollbar, Reverse camera, Smash and Grab, and Tonneau Cover.

MyRide will find the ride of your dreams, supported by exceptional customer service and countrywide delivery of all our new and pre-owned vehicles. Our team has decades of experience in the automotive industry and represents some of the greatest brands in the world. For your peace of mind, we pay attention to the smallest details to provide you with quality vehicles that keep you and your family safe. Our skilled sales staff provide excellent customer service, whilst our in-house finance experts ensure you get the best offer to suit your budget. We encourage test drives and welcome all trade-ins. Contact us today to find your ride with MyRide. We promise to make your vehicle purchasing experience seamless and convenient

attributes.description:
Carpointe- At Tavcor George we believe in first class customer service. 
All our Vehicles undergo a 80 Point Mechanical Check, AA Roadworthy Test and is Accident free unless advertised as otherwise. 
We do accept trade-ins of all Makes and Models. 
We have dedicated Finance Managers that can arrange finance for you should you want to finance the vehicle. We also offer Value Added Products like Service and Warranty Plan Extensions. 
We deliver Nationwide and charge a delivery fee depending on the distance of delivery. 
Price advertised excludes: Dealer Service Fee of R4000, Lic /Reg of R781, Number plates of R400.
